relation: Jesse Chavez starts the inning for the Royals.
Brandon Inge grounded out short to first. None on with one out and Alex Avila due up.
Alex Avila singled to right. Runner on first with one out and Casper Wells due up.
Casper Wells reached first on Josh Fields's fielding error. Runners on first and second with one out and Will Rhymes due up.
Will Rhymes tripled to center scored Alex Avila and Casper Wells with one out. Runner on third and Johnny Damon due up.
Johnny Damon intentionally walked. Runners on first and third with one out and Ryan Raburn due up.
Ryan Raburn single to right scored Will Rhymes with one out. Runners on first and third and Austin Jackson due up.
Austin Jackson sacrifice bunt to pitcher scored Johnny Damon with two out. Runner on second and Jhonny Peralta due up.
Jhonny Peralta flied out to left to end the inning.
